<h1 style="text-align: center; margin: 50px;">What Makes Your Song Shine on Spotify?</h1>

<head>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Signika:wght@300;400;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
</head>

<div class="section">
  <p style="font-size: 1.2em; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.8; color: #000000; margin: 20px; font-family: 'Signika', sans-serif;">
    In a world where music connects billions, have you ever wondered what makes a song truly stand out? Is it the beat, the duration, or the genre? Through this project, we dive deep into Spotify's vast database to uncover the hidden patterns behind a song's success.
  </p>
</div>

<h2 style="margin-top: 40px;">What You’ll Discover</h2>
<div class="section">
  <ul>
    <li><b>Music Trends Over Time</b>: Explore how popularity has evolved across genres and eras.</li>
    <li><b>Key Features of Hit Songs</b>: Uncover the optimal combination of factors like danceability, energy, and valence that make a song a hit.</li>
    <li><b>Insights for Creators</b>: Gain practical tips for crafting songs that resonate with listeners.</li>
  </ul>
</div>

<h2 style="margin-top: 40px;">Why This Matters</h2>
<div class="section">
  <p>
    Whether you're a music lover, an aspiring artist, or just curious, this project provides a unique perspective on what makes music shine in today's streaming world. Dive in to explore trends, results, and actionable insights that reveal the heartbeat of Spotify's most popular tracks.
  </p>
